chapters.title: Chapter 19: Memories
chapters.info: Lady Karind Anshar, p. 348 (247)—Woman whom Morgase recognizes at the Palace. Her stare allegedly put three husbands under the soil. She was banished from the Palace grounds except for state occasions for opposing Morgase during the Third War of Andoran Succession during which Morgase came to power. Gaebril invited her back to weaken Morgase's power.
